    1: """
    2: Public toolkit API.
    3: """
    4: 
    5: from pandas._libs.lib import infer_dtype
    6: 
    7: from pandas.core.dtypes.api import *  # noqa: F403
    8: from pandas.core.dtypes.concat import union_categoricals
    9: from pandas.core.dtypes.dtypes import (
   10:     CategoricalDtype,
   11:     DatetimeTZDtype,
   12:     IntervalDtype,
   13:     PeriodDtype,
   14: )
   15: 
   16: __all__ = [
   17:     "infer_dtype",
   18:     "union_categoricals",
   19:     "CategoricalDtype",
   20:     "DatetimeTZDtype",
   21:     "IntervalDtype",

   23: ]
